subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In Montreal, Mike Komisarek and Christopher Higgins are young stars for the Canadiens. But at home they are a couple of 20-somethings who live five minutes from each other in Huntington.
snippet: In Montreal, Mike Komisarek and Christopher Higgins are young stars for the Canadiens. But at home they are a couple of 20-somethings who live five minutes from each other in Huntington.
